name: Check if "Commit" statements have been used only where it is necessary (PeopleSoft)
description: This metric detects all artifacts using commit or rollback statements
output:
This report lists all artifacts using commit or rollback statements
It provides the following information:
- PeopleCode artifacts full name
- The associated value is the number commit and rollback found in the artifact source code
rationale: A commit consumes a lot of resources. Any extraneous commit should be identified and removed, to gain performance.
remediation: This report is there to prepare a list for review. Upon review, some commit or rollback statement could be removed when appropriate.
total: Number of PeopleSoft Events, Functions and Methods
